description: Play the game, watch the movie! Tekken 3D Prime Edition contains the complete entertainment world of TEKKEN on a single Nintendo 3DS card! Battle with more than 40 fighters from the TEKKEN universe and with Young Heihachi for the first time ever! In addition, watch TEKKEN: Blood Vengeance, a full 3D theatrical experience produced by Digital Frontier in conjunction with the Tekken Project development team. With the satisfying combination of a movie and fully featured portable Tekken gaming experience, players can take TEKKEN wherever they go.
name: TEKKEN 3D Prime Edition
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
